targets.expr: max by(pod, namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{pod=~".+", resource="cpu", unit="core", namespace=~"$namespace"})
max by(pod, namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{pod=~".+", resource="memory", unit="byte", namespace=~"$namespace"})
max by(pod, namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{pod=~".+", resource="cpu", unit="core", namespace=~"$namespace"})
